attributes.action: Urgently conduct a National Public Inquiry into Pakistani grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: The survivors have been badly let down by the very institutions that are supposed to protect them. Lesson must be learnt, and those responsible must be held to account.
attributes.background: I'm calling on the Government to conduct an urgent National Public Inquiry into the Pakistani grooming gangs. There are historic institutional failures which must be robustly investigated to hold those responsible to account and give justice to the survivors.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
